translation.en: [young man] I didn't really have your typical upbringing.
I mean, I did at first, but then the world ended.
translation.es: Digo, al principio sí, pero luego se acabó el mundo.

translation.en: I don't think anyone was really shocked.
We always thought it might, and then it just finally happened.
translation.es: Siempre pensamos que podría suceder y, al final, así fue.

translation.en: But how it happened, now that's where it gets interesting.
translation.es: Pero cómo sucedió… Ahí es donde se pone interesante.

translation.en: Yep, an asteroid heading straight for Earth.
translation.es: Sí, un asteroide que iba directo a la Tierra.

translation.en: I know. So obvious.
So, humanity came together, and we did what we do best.
translation.es: La humanidad se unió e hicimos lo que mejor hacemos.

translation.en: We shot a bunch of rockets at it! And we blew it up! And it was great!
translation.es: Lanzamos muchos cohetes. ¡Lo volamos y fue genial!

translation.en: But it wasn't. You see, the thing that makes rockets rockets--
translation.es: Pero no lo fue. Lo que hace que un cohete sea un cohete

translation.en: chemical compounds, a lot of 'em.
Which rained back down on us, and everything changed.
translation.es: Volvieron como lluvia y todo cambió.

translation.en: And by "everything," I mean cold-blooded creatures.
translation.es: Por "todo" me refiero a criaturas crueles.

translation.en: And by "changed," I mean mutated and started eating us to death.
translation.es: Y por "cambió" me refiero a mutar y comernos hasta morir.

translation.en: Ants, lizards, roaches, crocodiles. You name it. There's a lot of 'em.
translation.es: Hormigas, lagartos, cucarachas, cocodrilos… De todo. Hay muchos.

translation.en: -[man screams] -[loud squish]
I knew this one kid who was eaten in his sleep by a goldfish he won at a carnival.
translation.es: Conocí a un niño devorado mientras dormía por un pez dorado que se ganó en la feria.

translation.en: -[growls] -Man, Todd loved that goldfish.
translation.es: Conocí a un niño devorado mientras dormía por un pez dorado que se ganó en la feria. Todd amaba a ese pez dorado.

translation.en: And that cat.
So, for most of human history, if you wanted to kill a cockroach,
translation.es: Durante la historia humana, para matar cucarachas,

translation.en: all you needed was a shoe.
Well, suddenly you needed a shotgun. And sometimes even a tank.
translation.es: De repente, necesitabas una escopeta. A veces hasta un tanque.

translation.en: And sometimes even that doesn't work.
translation.es: Y a veces ni eso funciona.

translation.en: Especially if you don't stay in the tank, Bob.
translation.es: Sobre todo si no te quedas en el tanque, Bob.

translation.en: Eventually, the really big ones and our military took each other out.
translation.es: Al final, las más grandes y el ejército se mataron mutuamente.

translation.en: We lost 95% of the human population in about a year.
translation.es: Perdimos el 95 % de la población humana en un año.

translation.en: That's a lot of Bobs.
And a lot of Todds.
Those of us who survived, we hid anywhere we could--
translation.es: Los que sobrevivimos nos escondimos donde pudimos:

translation.en: bunkers, caves, panic rooms, all around the world.
translation.es: búnkeres, cuevas y cuartos de seguridad en todo el mundo.

translation.en: So for the last seven years I've been living in an underground bunker.
translation.es: Así que en los últimos siete años viví en un búnker subterráneo.

translation.en: It's not-- It's not as bad as it sounds. Really.
translation.es: No es tan malo como parece. En serio.

translation.en: It's a great group of people, and we all love each other.
translation.es: Es un grupo genial de gente y todos nos queremos.

translation.en: It's kinda what I imagined college would have been like.
translation.es: Así me imaginaba que sería la universidad.

translation.en: -[panting] -[woman] Are you sure he's asleep?
[man] Who?
-[woman] Joel. Who else? -[man] Yeah. He's asleep.
-[woman] Hang on. Shh. -[man] He's not awake.
-[woman] Are you sure? -It's just you.
[woman] I just-- I don't…
[man] Joel. Joel.
[whispering] See? He's not awake.
-It's just you. -[woman sighs]
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am wide awake.
I've just gotten good at not really moving or breathing.
translation.es: Me he vuelto bueno para no moverme ni respirar.

translation.en: Being stuck in a survival bunker
translation.es: Estar en un búnker de supervivencia

translation.en: with a bunch of people who have all found their soul mate is less than ideal.
translation.es: con un grupo de gente que halló a su alma gemela no es ideal.

translation.en: Karen and Ray got together a few months ago,
translation.es: Karen y Ray se juntaron hace unos meses,

translation.en: so they're still kinda in their honeymoon phase.
translation.es: así que siguen de luna de miel.

translation.en: -[Karen, Ray continue moaning] -It is super physical.
Good for them, you know. They're both very attractive and apparently quite flexible.
translation.es: Me alegro por ellos. Ambos son muy atractivos y muy flexibles.

translation.en: Hey, life's short. Especially down here.
translation.es: La vida es corta, sobre todo aquí abajo.

translation.en: -Oh. Hey, Ava. -[Ava] Hey, Joel.
-[man] Joel. How's it going? -It's going good, Tim.
-How are you-- How are you doing? -[Tim] Yeah, good.
[Joel] Cool.
-I couldn't sleep. -[Ava] Yeah, we know the feeling.
translation.es: - No podía dormir. - Sabemos qué se siente.

translation.en: Yeah. Probably not for the same reasons.
translation.es: Sí. Quizá no por las mismas razones.

translation.en: You guys's, uh, door's open. Is that-- Did you know that?
-[Ava] Yeah. -[Tim] Yeah, we know.
Okay.
[Joel] After Tim's parents were eaten by termites,
translation.es: Cuando las termitas devoraron a los padres de Tim,

translation.en: he and Ava became inseparable.
translation.es: él y Ava se volvieron inseparables.

translation.en: Okay. Good night.
-In every way. -[both] Night.
That's the asteroid they named 616 Agatha.
translation.es: Ese es el asteroide que llamaron Agatha 616.

translation.en: And these are all the chemical bombs they sent up to try and…
translation.es: Y estas las bombas químicas que enviaron para…

translation.en: [Joel] So, pretty much everyone's coupled up down here.
translation.es: Así que casi todos tienen pareja aquí.

translation.en: Our first baby was born last winter. It was super emotional.
translation.es: El primer bebé nació el invierno pasado. Fue muy emotivo.

translation.en: Welcome to the apocalypse, kid.
The food sucks. At least you'll never know what you're missing.
translation.es: La comida es terrible. Nunca sabrás lo que te pierdes.

translation.en: Kala and Connor got together after Carol died.
translation.es: Kala y Connor se hicieron novios cuando Carol murió.

translation.en: Carol was a cow who ate a box of laundry detergent.
translation.es: Carol era una vaca que se comió una caja de jabón.

translation.en: -And now we only have one cow. -[cow mooing]
translation.es: Y ahora solo tenemos una vaca.

translation.en: Her name's Gertie.
Gertie is great.
Gertie's not our only food source.
translation.es: No es la única fuente de alimento.

translation.en: We have a hunting party that brings back whatever they can from the surface.
translation.es: Tenemos un grupo de caza que trae lo que puede de la superficie.

translation.en: It was easier in the beginning, you know, before we ran out of bullets.
translation.es: Era más fácil al principio, antes de que se nos acabaran las balas.

translation.en: Facing down one of those things with a janky handmade weapon is no walk in the park.
translation.es: No es fácil enfrentar una de esas cosas con un arma casera deficiente.

translation.en: Or so they tell me. I-I don't go on the hunting parties.
translation.es: O eso me dicen. Yo no voy con los grupos de caza.

translation.en: They need me in the kitchen. I'm kinda the… -[chopping] -…the chef of the bunker.
translation.es: Me necesitan en la cocina. Soy algo así como el chef del búnker.

translation.en: Everyone likes my minestrone.
Being the only single person in the bunker has its perks too.
translation.es: Ser el único soltero del búnker tiene sus ventajas.

translation.en: I get to hang out with Mavis.
Of course, she's not much for conversation anymore.
Her core battery's shot, just like every other Mavis, I'd imagine.
translation.es: Su batería principal se dañó, como la de otras Mav1s, creo.

translation.en: Actually never seen a working one.
[Joel] Sure wish you were here, Aimee.
I'd love for you to meet everyone.
[Joel] Oh, yeah.
Maybe we could do a little target practice together.
translation.es: Podríamos practicar tiro al blanco juntos.

translation.en: It's kinda my thing.
translation.es: Es lo que se me da.

translation.en: Well…
-Sorry, Mavis. -[Gertie moos]
[Connor] Hustle, hustle, people. We gotta move.
[grunting] Guys!
Guys! I got the weapons.
-Stay. -What?
-Get what you need, and let's go. -What's happening? What's going on?
translation.es: - Tomen lo necesario y vámonos. - ¿Qué pasa?

translation.en: -[Connor] We're breached. -Breached?
-Joel. -What do you mean?
-Like inside-the-bunker breached? -That's what "breached" means, kiddo.
[whispers] Breached.
Anna Lucia and I will engage. Anderson and Tim, flank us.
translation.es: Anna Lucía y yo atacaremos. Anderson y Tim, flanquéennos.

translation.en: Flank 'em, yeah, okay. Where do you guys need me? The rear, or--
translation.es: Flanquéenlos, sí. ¿Dónde me necesitan? Atrás o…

translation.en: -I thought we were past this, Joel. -Past what? You need help. I can help.
translation.es: - Ya hablamos de esto. - ¿De qué? Puedo ayudar.

translation.en: -Let me help. -You gonna make me say it?
-Say what? -You can't handle it, Joel.
-You're shook. -Okay, yeah.
-So, you guys don't get scared ever? -[Connor] We get scared.
[Tim] We all get scared, Joel, but you get really scared.
translation.es: Todos nos asustamos, pero tú más.

translation.en: -We're not trying to make you feel bad. -We love you, Joel.
translation.es: - No queremos hacerte sentir mal. - Te queremos.

translation.en: [Connor] But you're unsafe.
-[Tim] You're a liability. -Even on supply runs.
translation.es: - Eres un lastre. - Hasta para traer suministros.

translation.en: Okay, why did that speech feel so rehearsed?
-Connor. -[device beeps]
Okay, 30 meters out. Let's move.
-Be careful, Connor-Bear. -I will, Kala-Bee.
translation.es: - Cuidado, Osito Connor. - Sí, Abejita Kala.

translation.en: [Connor] Load out.
Go with them.
[Karen] They're getting close.
-[gasps] -[Ava] Shit.
[Karen whispers] Oh, my God.
-[Anderson] It got one of 'em. -[Karen] What about the others?
translation.es: - Tiene a uno de ellos. - ¿Y los demás?

translation.en: They're coming back.
They need help. I'm going.
[Kala] Joel! Wait!
-[whispering] Connor? -[faint groan]
Did I shoot it, or did you?
What do you think?
You.
[Joel] Oh, and I have a pretty severe freezing problem.
translation.es: Y tengo un problema bastante grave de parálisis.

translation.en: But I am working on it.
-[woman whispers] How is it looking? -I think it looks really good.
-Does it look like me? -Yeah.
Are you sure that this pose looks natural?
translation.es: ¿Estás seguro de que esta pose se ve natural?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
I think it's really good.
What are you doing? Don't move.
-Will you let me see it? -Don't-- Don't move. Aimee.
translation.es: - ¿Me dejas verlo? - No te muevas. Aimee.

translation.en: -I really wanna see it. -[growls]
Okay.
Okay.
-Ready? -Mm-hmm.
[Joel] What do you think?
Why do I have a beard? [snickers]
No, that's shading. I did the shading.
translation.es: Es la sombra. Hice el sombreado.

translation.en: My head is-- is so large.
-You have a big head. -And my hand is so tiny.
translation.es: - Tienes una cabeza grande. - Y mi mano es muy pequeña.

translation.en: You have tiny hands.
I love it. I frickin' love it.
translation.es: Me encanta. De verdad me encanta.

translation.en: -That's super sweet, 'cause it's terrible. -[Aimee laughs]
-I got you something too. -What?
I don't know if these are the right ones.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sé si son los correctos.

translation.en: No way. These are the ones that I-I-I wanted to get.
translation.es: No puedo creerlo. Son los que quería comprar.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-What's happening right now? -Uh--
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm dancing with my shoulders.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? - Sí, bailo con los hombros.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -Oh, yeah.
This has been the best summer of my life.
translation.es: Ha sido el mejor verano de mi vida.

translation.en: Mine too.
What are you doing?
-Do you know what time it is? -Uh, I think it's, like, 6:30.
translation.es: - ¿Sabes qué hora es? - Creo que son las 6:30.

translation.en: Aimee, you're-- you're scaring Crocodile Carl.
translation.es: Aimee, estás asustando a Carl el Cocodrilo.

translation.en: Okay, look away, Crocodile Carl.
translation.es: Bien, no mires, Carl el Cocodrilo.

translation.en: Oh. Look away. Hey, I get it.
-[Aimee giggles] -I get it.
We need to go.
I'm scared.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, This week has been especially shitty.
translation.es: Querida Aimee: Esta semana ha sido especialmente mala.

translation.en: We lost Connor to what looked like a really big ant.
translation.es: Perdimos a Connor a causa de una hormiga gigante.

translation.en: Helps me to draw them.
I try to capture their essence,
scribble down some notes on how to kill them.
Sometimes I think it's the only way I know how to cope with these things.
translation.es: A veces creo que solo así sé lidiar con ellos.

translation.en: -[switch clicks] -This is 7045. Come in, 3022.
-I repeat, come in, 3022. Over. -[switch clicks]
[woman] This is 3022. What is it now, Ray?
Hey, Janice. No, it's actually-- It's, uh, Joel.
-[chuckles] Oh. Joel. -Yeah.
All right. Hold on one second.
Aimee, it's Ray!
It's Joel. Thanks, Janice.
-[Aimee] Joel! Hey! -Hey, Aimee! Hi!
-How are you? -Hi. Yeah, I, uh-- I'm good.
-It's so good to hear your voice. -I'm so sorry.
translation.es: - Me alegra escuchar tu voz. - Lo siento mucho.

translation.en: I heard on the open frequency that one of you guys got killed.
translation.es: Oí en la frecuencia abierta que mataron a uno de ustedes.

translation.en: Yeah. Breached the bunker.
Wow. Actually got inside?
Yeah. It's the first time it's happened. It was kinda scary.
translation.es: Sí. Es la primera vez que pasa. Fue bastante aterrador.

translation.en: Did you have to fight it too?
Yeah. Yeah, a little. I had to fight it a little bit.
translation.es: Sí, un poco. Tuve que luchar un poco.

translation.en: Actually got super ripped since the last time you saw me, so--
translation.es: Me puse muy fuerte desde la última vez que me viste…

translation.en: Oh. Wow! [giggles] Super ripped, huh?
Yeah, I was kidding. I'm not super ripped. That was just a bad joke.
translation.es: Estaba bromeando. No estoy muy fuerte. Fue un mal chiste.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you're okay.
Thanks. Yeah.
I am still kinda blown away that you were even able to find my colony on this thing.
translation.es: Me sorprende que encontraras mi colonia en esta cosa.

translation.en: I know. It's pretty crazy.
'Cause I found it on the first one. What are the odds?
translation.es: Porque la encontré en la primera. ¡Qué casualidad!

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -[Aimee] Crazy.
Yeah. No, I-I called-- I called, like, 90.
Hey, you know what I, uh-- know what I wish sometimes?
What?
That I could, like, s-snap my fingers and be back in that car with you.
translation.es: Poder chasquear los dedos y volver a estar en el auto contigo.

translation.en: Man, that'd be nice.
Yeah. Too bad it's, uh…
you know, impossible.
Kinda feels like everything is impossible these days.
translation.es: Parece que todo es imposible ahora.

translation.en: Taking care of this whole colony is exhausting.
translation.es: Cuidar de toda esta colonia es agotador.

translation.en: I, uh-- I-I write you letters.
Really?
Yeah. Yeah, I-I write you letters sometimes.
translation.es: Sí, a veces te escribo cartas.

translation.en: -Aw! -All the time.
I'd love to read 'em.
-Really? I would love to read them to-- -[static surges, stops]
-No. Aimee? -[switches clicking]
-Aimee? -[static buzzing]
[Joel] We've lost a lot of people over the years.
translation.es: Con los años, perdimos a mucha gente.

translation.en: You'd think you'd get numb to it after a certain point.
translation.es: Uno creería que, eventualmente, te vuelves insensible.

translation.en: You don't.
-I'm sorry. -Thank God! Where have you been, Joel?
We have to go right now. Say your goodbyes, get in the car.
translation.es: Debemos irnos ahora. Despídete y sube al auto.

translation.en: -I should go. -Maybe you should come with us.
-No, my mom is waiting. I'm sorry. -[creature roaring]
translation.es: No, mamá me espera. Lo siento.

translation.en: Get in the car! Aimee, you need to hurry home now!
translation.es: ¡Sube al auto! Aimee, ve rápido a casa.

translation.en: -I want you to have this. -What? This is Crocodile Carl.
It's your good luck charm.
-Be careful. -You too.
I love you.
I love you too.
I'm gonna come find you.
You better.
[Aimee's voice] You better.
[Anna Lucia] I wanna know how it got in.
[Ray] It appears to have ripped through one of our perimeter defenses.
translation.es: Atravesó una de las defensas perimetrales.

translation.en: [Ava] It ripped through steel?
[Tim] Anderson and I resealed the breach point and vent.
translation.es: Anderson y yo sellamos el punto de entrada.

translation.en: -Nothing's getting in that way again. -But why did it happen?
translation.es: - Nada volverá a entrar por ahí. - ¿Por qué pasó?

translation.en: It was a freak occurrence. There's no reason to think it'll happen again.
translation.es: Fue inesperado. Nada indica que volverá a pasar.

translation.en: -[Ray] We should try to stay calm. -[all arguing]
-How far away is Aimee's colony? -[arguing stops]
translation.es: ¿Cuán lejos está la colonia de Aimee?

translation.en: -What? -Aimee's colony.
-How far away is it? -About 85 miles.
-How long does that take to get there? -You're not actually thinking of going?
translation.es: - ¿Cuánto toma llegar ahí? - ¿No estarás pensando en ir?

translation.en: Tim, just… humor me.
-How long? -Seven days.
Minimum.
An armed and trained hunting party would be lucky to last 50 miles on the surface.
translation.es: Un grupo de caza armado y entrenado duraría 80 km en la superficie.

translation.en: But you, Joel…
All right, now I need volunteers to help reinforce some of the outer perimeter.
translation.es: Bien, ahora necesito voluntarios para reforzar el perímetro exterior.

translation.en: -[Anna Lucia] Yeah, I'm gonna go. -[all chattering]
-Ava's got this. -[Karen] Exactly.
I'm gonna go.
It's an impossible journey, Joel.
No, I'm serious.
I love you guys, but there's one person in this world
translation.es: Los quiero, pero solo hay una persona en este mundo que me hizo feliz,

translation.en: who ever truly made me happy,
translation.es: pero solo hay una persona en este mundo que me hizo feliz,

translation.en: and she's only 85 miles away.
And I'm gonna go see her.
That felt awesome.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am done hiding.
translation.es: Querida Aimee: Ya no quiero esconderme.

translation.en: I'm done waiting for things to get better.
translation.es: Ya no quiero esperar a que todo mejore.

translation.en: It's time to take matters into my own hands.
translation.es: Es hora de tomar las riendas.

translation.en: Time to let someone else make the minestrone.
translation.es: De que alguien más haga la minestrone.

translation.en: I'm taking a radio, even though it doesn't have power.
translation.es: Llevaré una radio, aunque no tenga energía.

translation.en: But I'm gonna take it anyway.
-Wish me luck, Gertie. -[Gertie moos]
Mavis, take care of her.
You're not joking, are you?
Nope. Nope, I'm not.
He's not joking.
We're not letting you leave, Joel. You're needed here.
translation.es: No te dejaremos ir, Joel. Te necesitamos aquí.

translation.en: Tim, no, I'm not. Come on. I don't do anything.
translation.es: Tim, no me necesitan. Vamos. Yo no hago nada.

translation.en: Joel, that's not true. You fix the radio. You make the minestrone.
translation.es: No es cierto. Arreglas la radio. Haces la minestrone.

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. Doesn't sound as important when I say it out loud.
translation.es: No suena tan importante cuando lo digo en voz alta.

translation.en: I appreciate you trying. Really, I do.
I just don't feel like I belong anywhere.
translation.es: No me siento en casa en ningún lado.

translation.en: I don't really wanna die all alone at the end of the world, so…
translation.es: No quiero morir solo cuando acabe el mundo, así que…

translation.en: Look, I know you guys all just think of me as, like, some little, pathetic,
translation.es: Sé que todos ustedes me ven como un pequeño erizo patético

translation.en: adorable hedgehog.
But I can take care of myself.
I'm actually probably a lot stronger than you might think.
translation.es: Soy mucho más fuerte de lo que creen.

translation.en: -We made you a map. -Thanks, Karen.
translation.es: - Te hicimos un mapa. - Gracias, Karen.

translation.en: Just… take care.
Everything will try to kill you.
Be observant. Use the advantages that you have.
-You're fast and small, so… -Right.
translation.es: - Eres rápido y pequeño, así que… - Sí.

translation.en: -Don't fight. -Don't fight.
Just run and hide.
Thanks, Ray.
You're an asshole if you get eaten.
translation.es: Eres un idiota si te comen.

translation.en: -Okay. -Nice.
I love you guys. Tell Aimee I'll see her in seven days.
translation.es: Los quiero. Díganle a Aimee que la veré en siete días.

translation.en: -[Anderson] We believe in you. -[Tim] Love you, buddy.
Where am I?
Well, it's not super useful.
Okay, well, you know what? We know we gotta head west. Right?
translation.es: Bien, ¿sabes qué? Sabemos que debemos ir al oeste. ¿Verdad?

translation.en: So, let's just… do that.
Start with something easy. West.
Nope, it's this way. West is this way.
translation.es: No, es por acá. El oeste es por acá.

translation.en: Shit.
Split the difference. Go this way.
translation.es: Ni uno ni otro. Iré por acá.

translation.en: Done. First decision made.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am doing it.
I'm really doing it!
Honestly, I thought it'd be way worse. So far, it's not too bad.
translation.es: En serio, creí que sería mucho peor. Hasta ahora, no está tan mal.

translation.en: I've seen a lot of signs of death, but no actual death.
translation.es: Vi muchas señales de muerte, pero ninguna muerte real.

translation.en: So, cross your fingers.
Monster eggs.
Trying to stay positive.
Weather's nice. Getting some fresh air. What else can I tell ya?
translation.es: El clima es lindo. Respiro aire fresco. ¿Qué más puedo decirte?

translation.en: Cool.
-Wham-O-- -[creatures chirping]
-[wings fluttering] -No.
-[branches snapping] -Run and hide.
Hide in the house. Hide in the house.
No, no, no. No!
No, no, no! [screaming]
-[growling] -Yes! Bite it! Bite it off!
Wait. Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
Where are you going?
Whoa, that was so cool.
Nice place.
-Can I sit? -[whines]
Thanks.
You all alone?
-[whines] -Yeah. Me too.
-Boy? -[grunts]
Is that your name? Boy? Your name is Boy.
translation.es: ¿Ese es tu nombre? ¿Boy? Te llamas Boy.

translation.en: I'm Joel.
Nice to meet ya.
Thanks, uh… Thanks for saving my life, Boy.
translation.es: Gracias por salvarme la vida, Boy.

translation.en: -[growls, whines] -Is this a dress?
Oh. Oh. Oh. Oh. Sorry.
Okay, I won't touch it again.
translation.es: Bien, no lo volveré a tocar.

translation.en: Was that your owner's?
It's okay. You don't have to talk about it.
translation.es: Está bien. No tienes que hablar de eso.

translation.en: Sorry.
Wait. Did you think I was her?
I'm gonna lie down too. Is that o--
No, it's okay. Just my backpack.
translation.es: No, está bien. Es solo mi mochila.

translation.en: You know, I had a girl, too, once.
Think you would've really liked her. You guys would totally get along.
translation.es: Creo que te habría agradado. Se llevarían muy bien.
